Represents a comment in a forum.

Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 commentId

The unique identifier for the comment.
System.String commentText

The text content of the comment.
DateTime dateCreated

The date and time the comment was created.
System.Int32 userId

The unique identifier for the user who created the comment.
User user

The user object who created the comment.
System.Int32 postId

The unique identifier for the post the comment belongs to.
Post post

The post object the comment belongs to.
